pr_title: Fix the loading of records into NewOrders table.

timeline.message:
Fix the loading of records into NewOrders table.

Summary:
The loop for insertion in loadOrders inserts about 900 open orders per
district. However the rows from the last district is not carried over to
the next one.
This change fixes that.

Reviewers: Neha, Karthik

timeline.author: ndeodhar
